description: This file contains utility functions for session handling, string manipulation, data parsing, time conversions, and device information retrieval within a larger network management or configuration project.

methods.name: php_getstr
methods.description: Wraps getStr to return a string or empty based on PSM mode and specific substrings.

methods.name: php_getinstanceids
methods.description: Wraps getInstanceIds with PSM mode considerations.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Processes root and parameter arrays to return a key-value mapping derived from DmExtGetStrsWithRootObj.

methods.name: encrypt_map
methods.description: Maps encryption modes and methods to human-readable descriptions.

methods.name: getLeafName
methods.description: Extracts the leaf node name from a full parameter string, given a root.

methods.name: getObjIdInPath
methods.description: Extracts object ID from a parameter path based on root.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values from a DM object root, supporting multiple parameters and mapping.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Generates a webpage message indicating PSM mode status.

methods.name: php_str_and
methods.description: Performs a bitwise AND operation on two hexadecimal strings.

methods.name: array_trim
methods.description: Trims and filters out empty strings from an array.

methods.name: getDefault
methods.description: Reads default values from an XML file for given parameter names.

methods.name: div_sub
methods.description: Performs division by repeated subtraction, returning quotient and remainder.

methods.name: hm_to_sec
methods.description: Converts hours:minutes to seconds.

methods.name: sec_to_hm
methods.description: Converts seconds to hours:minutes format.

methods.name: shift_blockedDays
methods.description: Shifts days of the week forward or backward based on a boolean flag.

methods.name: group_2D_array
methods.description: Groups a 2D array based on specified fields.

methods.name: local_to_UTC_Time
methods.description: Converts local time to UTC and adjusts blocked days accordingly.

methods.name: UTC_to_local_Time
methods.description: Converts UTC time to local time and adjusts blocked days.

methods.name: UTC_to_local_date
methods.description: Converts UTC datetime string to local date string.

methods.name: UTC_to_local_date_logs
methods.description: Converts UTC datetime string to local log date string.

methods.name: time_in_min
methods.description: Converts HH:MM time to total minutes.

methods.name: cmp
methods.description: Comparison function for sorting objects by StartTime.

methods.name: merge_days
methods.description: Merges adjacent or overlapping time ranges.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_get
methods.description: Converts array of ranges from UTC to local time/days groups.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_set
methods.description: Converts start/end times and days from local to UTC, considering day changes.

methods.name: time_date_conflict
methods.description: Checks for conflicts in time ranges across days.

methods.name: resolve_IPV6_global_address
methods.description: Resolves and returns IPV6 address, prioritizing available inputs.

methods.name: get_wan_type
methods.description: Determines WAN connection type based on device info.
